reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug fits well, with one noting it hits at the waist, and appreciate its quality as a perfect little sweater jacket that's right for spring and summer. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer describing it as a beautiful deep burgundy shrug, and customers like its versatility, noting it can be dressed up or worn casually. The material thickness and sizing receive mixed reviews - wh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and delicate shrug for warm weather
items.body: Lovely color (I ordered the light pink) and pretty, albeit delicate, knit. Perfect and lightweight for warmer days, does not add bulk. Soft and fits true to size. I usually wear medium in knit tops and shrugs but had ordered it in large as sometimes clothing items from unknown manufacturers on Amazon run small. I should have ordered the medium for a perfect fit but the large is acceptable. Will order again in another color (and in medium). I will be careful with it as it could potentially snag easily as with any light and delicate knit. Good value for the price. Read more
items.author: Darcy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color and fit as expected
items.body: Good color (as pictured) and weight. Was not sheer. Quality seemed good. Fit was realistic - - I'm typically a Size 6 for separate tops. Would have functioned fine (for wedding, atop halter dress) but just needed a different color and style in the end. Read more
items.author: John J Dunstone

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight true to size
items.body: Very nice. Lightweight, slightly cropped, hits right at the waist. Very true ti size wouldn’t hurt to size up. Was what I needed for my outfit. Read more
items.author: Cindy Rollins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought 3 different cardigans, here are my thoughts
items.body: I’m comparing cardigans from 3 different brands/sellers, let’s get into it. There are tons of cardigans on Amazon and I narrowed down my options to these 3: Heymoments, Lansaliro, and iClosam. I needed a navy cardigan to wear with a dress or several dresses. It’s hot, so I wanted something that was lightweight and breezy for 100°+ degree summer heat. Transparent enough to breathe and feel comfortable but opaque enough to give some protection from the sun. I needed it to be cropped. Things they have in common: These brands seemed to have good reviews and pricing. All looked to fit the criteria I set. They are all true navy in color, the exact same color. Stitching was good, no loose threads, no weird smells. They all fit well. They are all cropped with 3/4 sleeves. They are all pretty thin and lightweight but there are differences. What’s the difference? Well at a glance, Heymoments and Lansaliro look identical but Heymoments is thinner, lighter, more airy than Lansaliro. Lansaliro is lightweight but it is more dense than Heymoments. It is even more dressier looking and feeling than Heymoments. Lansaliro would be the best option to wear to work, fancy event or dressier outfit. While HeyMoments may work for that too, it is more versatile to dress up or dress down. Also, Lansaliro may be best to wear in spring or fall. While HeyMoments would be great to wear in spring, summer, and fall. My photos compare the fabric transparency. Heymoments is the happy medium, while Lansaliro is thickest/most dense. Both are very soft and comfortable to wear. But Heymoments seems a touch softer, but not too soft. They are so similar but it really comes down to the fabric thickness/weight/density. But when comparing these two, I think Both of these are well made options that would easily earn 5 stars from me. As for iClosam, this one seems to be of lower quality than I would want. It’s not terrible, it just doesn’t seem like it would hold up over time. It’s just way too thin and the loosely woven fabric is way too flimsy. Sometimes loose knits are just naturally more delicate anyway, but this isn’t going to work for me. Seems like it would unravel in the wash over time. If it got a snag, it would be ruined quickly. But it does feel very soft, comfortable to wear, and very breezy to wear in summer. It’s way too casual for what I want to wear it with. You can’t dress this up. It’s very relaxed, probably best as loungewear. I have other open-knit/crochet cardigans that are better quality. So I would rate this 3 stars. I ended up choosing Heymoments. But I plan to purchase Lansaliro in black. I hope this helps narrow the search for the perfect cardigan. Read more
items.author: ladybossplanner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, nice fabric, dressy.
items.body: Nice fabric, not wrinkle prone (had in bag to store at wedding until I needed it), great fit, wore for a fall wedding, color navy, dressy style. Read more
items.author: F J

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy
items.body: It is very light weight. It will work with the dress I have but I probably will not reorder. Read more
items.author: Rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and true to size. I got a small and it was perfect.
items.body: Very nice. It is thin but that is why I like it. Perfect to wear over a black spaghetti strap black dress to a wedding where we were requested to wear black. Read more
items.author: BVW

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good fit
items.body: It’s thin, but it’s ok. Still trying to get a heavy crease out of the front. I don’t have a steamer, but I’m sure that would fix the problem.. all in all , I like the color, texture, and fit of the item. I’m 5 ft 180 lbs. bought an xl to cover my chest, order a smaller size, if you don’t mind a big open front. Read more
items.author: Netty

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A22-light Blue, A13-burgundy, A14-magenta, A08-red, A17-brown, A09-green, A02-white, A25-yellow, B09-rosybrown Hibiscus, B10-lavender Blue Blossom, B06-luxuriant Flowers Red, A05-light Gray, A16-lake Blue, B04-tricolor Blossoms. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
